/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. On either side of the street, brick buildings stand tall, their red roofs adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. Power lines crisscross above the street, forming a web-like pattern against the sky. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, casting everything in sharp focus. It's a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, captured in one single frame.
